summary: The secrets about unlocking the mysteries of consciousness by plant-drugs. The related chances and risks involved in this shamanism.
cast: Pablo Amaringo|Guillermo Arévalo|Michel Boccara|J.C. Callaway|Jean 'Moebius' Giraud|Alex Grey|Charles Grob|Stanislav Grof|Jan Kounen|Luis Eduardo Luna|Kary B. Mullis|Jeremy Narby|Rick Strassman
title: D'autres mondes
